meanings.definition: The study of events or conditions existing or occurring before recorded history.

meanings.definition: The history of human beings before the appearance of written records.
meanings.sent1: Studying prehistories reveals how early humans lived.
meanings.sent2: Researchers piece together prehistories through artifacts and fossils.
meanings.sent3: The museum exhibit on prehistories was both educational and entertaining.
